section.title: Overview
section.para: The module extends presence server implementation with ability of handling ua-profile event. When an user agent subscribes to ua-profile event for its own AoR, it will retrieve profile data document via body of NOTIFY request.
The profile data document format is usually specific per user agent, such documents have to be built and added to presentity table by the admin or a third party application.

Warning: When you add profile data document (i.e., user agent's provisioning config) to presentity table, then you must make sure that you set the presentity table expires field to a time value in long future.
Read more about SIP user agent configuration framework in RFC6080: http://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc6080.

section.title: &kamailio; Modules
section.para:
The following modules must be loaded before this module:
presence.

section.title: Exported Functions
section.para: None to be used in configuration file.
